amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in House Report 115-259 to increase funding to the Advanced Manufacturing Office within the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $20 million by cutting $40 million from the Fossil Energy Research and Development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 224 (Roll no. 422).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty (CT) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 224 (Roll no. 422).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Ms. Esty (CT).
